name: Brother in Arms
description: You can call a friendly solders with a radio. It's war time! **New Friends -United States Marine Corps -Special Weapons And Tactics -Nazi Schutzstaffel -Russian Spetsnaz -Japan Self Defense Forces -United States Colonial Marine Corps -Tank -Helicopter -Aliens -Predators etc... **New Weapons & Equipments -M67 flag grenade -T82 flame grenade -ES22 stun grenade -P625E radium grenade -RPG-7 -NGT stealth device -First aid kit -Plasma battery etc...
